page-index-bento-header: Kwan foforo aa ye fa so de internet di dwuma
page-index-bento-assets-content: Art, setifiket, anaa adan koraa yetumi ye no token. Bibiara betumi aye token aa yedi di dwa. Ne so die wo amansan anim na yesanso gye tum
page-index-bento-assets-title: Ahoma torofo a ɛfa agyapadeɛ ho
page-index-bento-dapps-content: Ethereum apps no ye adwuma mmere aa enton wo ho nsem. Ebo wo kokoam nsem ho ban.
page-index-bento-defi-content: Mpempem betumi ebue bank akawnt anaa won betumi di won sika edi dwuma aa wontua ho ka. Ethereum sikasem de yebie mie mu na enye nyiyimu.
page-index-bento-defi-title: Sikasɛm nhyehyɛe nisiaie nni mu na ɛfata
page-index-bento-networks-content: Ethereum ye beae ma blockchain ade foforo ye. Project apapa nyinna yesi no wo Ethereum so.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Stablecoins ye sika aa ne mfaso gyina ne nanso. Ne buo no ne U.S. dollar ne agyapade ahodo aa egyina ne nanso ye pe.
page-index-builders-description: Ethereum ye fie de ma Web3 adeyefo aa eso paa na esan kanya ne ho ecosystem. Fa JavaScript, ne Python di dwuma, anaa sua adwenemu kontrakt kasa te se Solidity anaa Vyper na fa twere woankasa wo app.
page-index-builders-header: Blockchain adansifo mantam aa eso paa
page-index-community-description-1: Nsɛm asekyerɛfoɔ, coders, designers, copywriters, ne mpɔtam hɔfoɔ ɔhaha pii na wɔkyekyere na wɔhwɛ so bosome biara.
page-index-community-description-2: Bra bebisa nsɛm, wo ne nnipa a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa nni nkitaho na fa boa ma wɔ wɛbsaet no so. Wobɛnya osuahu a mfasoɔ wɔ so a ɛfata na wɔakyerɛ wo kwan wɔ adeyɛ no mu!
page-index-community-description-3: Ethereum.org mpɔtam hɔfoɔ yɛ beaeɛ a ɛyɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ a wobɛtumi ahyɛ aseɛ na woasua adeɛ.
page-index-community-header: Mpotam fuo no aa na esi ye
page-index-cta-networks-description: Nya enigye fri ka ketewaa mu
page-index-description: Beae aa edikan di ma apps afoforo ne blockchain netweks
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Fa logic aa waye no si bank
Ye token aa wobetumi amena na wode edi dwuma wɔ aplikeshins ahorow nyinaa mu
Wubetumi de kasa ahorow a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw adi dwuma wɔ Ethereum ne kɔmputa aplikeshɔn afoforo adi nkitaho
Wubetumi asan asusuw nnwuma a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw no ho sɛ kɔmputa application ahorow a wɔde ahyɛ amansan nsa, a wɔabue ano
page-index-developers-code-example-title: DNS a wɔabue mu, a wɔmma ho kwan
page-index-events-subtitle: Ethereum mpotam ye dwumadie wo wiase afanan nyinaa, afe mu no nyinaa
page-index-hero-image-alt: Mfoni a egyina hɔ ma Ethereum daakye kurow, a ɛbɛba a nkwa wom nhyehyɛe.
page-index-join-action-contribute-descri: Hunu kwan afoforo nyinaa aa wobetumi aboa ama ethereum.org enyini na aye papa.
page-index-join-action-contribute-label: Sɛ ɛbɛyɛ sen na wama bi
page-index-join-action-discord-descripti: Bisa nsem, kodinati nea wooma no na fa woho hye mpotam afre ne mu.
page-index-join-action-github-descriptio: Fa bi ma kod, nhyehyee, ne atwere, ne ahodo pii
page-index-join-action-twitter-descripti: Di yen updates ne nsem aa eho hia akyi
page-index-join-description: Saa wɛbsaet yi yɛ open source a mpɔtam hɔfoɔ ɔhaha pii a wɔde mmoa ma. Wubetumi akyrɛ wadwin sɛ wɔnyɛ nsakrae wɔ nneɛma a ɛwɔ saa wɛbsaet yi so no mu biara mu, kyrɛ wadwin sɛ wɔmfa nneɛma foforo a ɛyɛ hu nyɛ adwuma, anaasɛ wobɛboa yɛn ma yɛabɔ mfomso ahorow.
page-index-learn-description: Crypto betumi aye ade aa emu ye den. Enhaha, yaye saa nnema wei ama wo se enboa mma wo ntease wo Ethereum ho wo bere tiawa bi mu.
page-index-meta-description: Ethereum yɛ wiase nyinaa efidie, a wɔde ahyɛ aman nsa, ma sika ne kɔmputa application ahorow foforo. Wɔ Ethereum so no, wobɛtumi akyerɛw kod ɛhwɛ sika so, na woakyekye kɔmputa aplikeshins a wobɛtumi akɔ so wɔ wiase baabiara.
page-index-network-stats-tx-cost-descrip: Sɛ wɔkyekyem pɛpɛɛpɛ a, ɛka a wɔbɔ wɔ asɛm no ho
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-descript: Nkitahodi wɔ 24h a atwam no mu
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-desc: Mfaso a wɔatoto mu wɔ DeFi mu
page-index-network-stats-total-value-hel: Botae a wɔakura wɔ Ethereum so nyinaa
page-index-posts-action: Kenkan nea eka ho pii wɔ wɛbsaet ahorow yi so
page-index-posts-subtitle: Blog nsɛm a aba foforo ne nsɛm foforo a efi mpɔtam hɔ
page-index-title: Yɛma wo akwaaba ba Ethereum so
page-index-values-description: Bɛka dijitaal nsakrae no fã no ho
page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Sɛ wowɔ sikakorabea anaa social media platform daa a, ahyehyɛde no na ɛhwɛ w’agyapade ne w’a data so. Wode wo ho to wɔn so sɛ wobenya kwan akɔ hɔ na wɔadi so.
Ebia wɔde wo data bedi dwuma wɔ akwan horow so a ebia wo ne no nyɛ adwene, a egyina wɔn nhyehyɛe ahorow so.
page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: Ethereum, wo nko ara na wowɔ kwan ne control. Ɛnsɛ sɛ obi foforo tumi de w’agyapade di dwuma da. Wubetumi asi onii a wobɛma saa kwan no ho gyinae.
page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Ɛnnɛ, ɛnyɛ obiara na ɔwɔ sikasɛm ho nhyehyɛe koro. Ebia nnipa binom behyia akwanside ahorow a wontumi nkɔ hɔ esiane beae a wɔwɔ anaa ɔman a wofi mu nti.
page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Yegye di sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma obiara kwan ma onya wiase nyinaa nhyehyɛe bi so mfaso. Ɛno nti na Ethereum ma wiase nyinaa kwan a ɛyɛ pɛ, ɛmfa ho onipa ko a woyɛ anaa baabi a wofi.
page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Yɛrentumi nhwɛ kwan sɛ aban ahorow, nnwumakuw, anaa ahyehyɛde akɛse afoforo a wonni anim bɛma yɛn kokoam nsɛm afi wɔn mfaso horow mu.
App dodow no ara boaboa w’ankasa wo ho nsɛm ano sɛnea wobetumi sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobetumi de aguadi a wɔayɛ ama wo no de wɔn ani asi wo so.
page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Ethereum mpɔtam hɔfo bu kokoam nsɛm. Wo wowɔ hokwan sɛ wode apps di dwuma a worenda wo ho anaa wo nkitahodi ho nsɛm adi.
page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: App dodow no ara piapia wo ma woyɛ akontaabu ahorow, na ɛma ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛkae wo login ho nsɛm ne wo din a woakyerɛw nyinaa.
page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: Ethereum wobɛtumi asan de akonta baako adi dwuma wɔ apps nyinaa mu mmom. Ɛho nhia sɛ ankorankoro kyerɛw wɔn din.
page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Ankorankoro nnwumayɛfo ne wɔn a wɔwɔ kyɛfa wɔ nnwumakuw no mu. Wɔn nkutoo na wodi adwumakuw no so na wonya mfaso kɛse fi ne nkonimdi mu.
page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Te sɛ intanɛt ankasa no, Ethereum nyɛ obiara dea. Wɔkyɛ na wɔayɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ ne obiara. Owura biako biara nni hɔ a obetumi adi so.
page-index-values-censorship-legacy-labe: Ye tumi yi bi firi mu
page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Nnɛyi asɛnka agua ne ne mmara taa sesa. Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu, adwumakuw mpanyimfo anaa nniso ahorow a ɛhyɛ nkurɔfo so mpo betumi anya wɔn so nkɛntɛnso.
page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-la: Empe se yebeyi bi efri mu
page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Nhyɛso a wɔsɔre tia no yɛ Ethereum mu ade titiriw. Ɛsɛ sɛ ne dwumadi kɔ so yɛ nea ɛfata na ɛnyɛ animhwɛ bere nyinaa.
Ethereum no, ɔman man, adwumakuw anaa ankorankoro biara ntumi nni so.
page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Nnwumakuw bɔ wɔn adwene mu agyapade ho ban na wɔnkyɛ. Obiara nni adwumakuw no akyi a obetumi ahu sɛnea nneɛma yɛ adwuma, nsiesie ɔhaw ahorow, anaa nnya nkɔso. Ɛyɛ den ma nkurɔfo sɛ wɔbɛbɔ nnwinnade foforo anaasɛ wɔbɛyɛ sɛnea wɔpɛ.
page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum yɛ baguam ma obiara. Obiara betumi ahu, de adi dwuma, na ama mmara no atu mpɔn, na ama ayɛ papa ama obiara.
